#summary Step by step tutorial how to get running acris from source code
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Steps to setup the acris project = 

== Prerequisites ==
  * JDK 1.6+
  * Maven [2.0.9,> (currently tested on 2.1.0 and 2.2.1)
  * Brain

== Steps ==
  * Download sources from http://acris.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
  * copy (or merge acris-os profile from) settings.xml to your maven home directory (~/.m2)
     * if you already have settings.xml copy the acris-os profile and activate it
  * cd acris-os-parent
  * mvn clean install
  * pray, a lot, for no error messages

== Running from web container (tomcat) == 

Following step are related to acris-binding showcase project (other projects are analogical)

  * cd acris-binding
  * mvn -f pom-showcase.xml package 
  * deploy on tomcat - copy acris-binding-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT.war from target directory to your CATALINA_HOME/webapps
  * start tomcat - CATALINA_HOME/bin/start.bat

== Running from eclipse == 

Following step are related to acris-binding showcase project (other projects are analogical)

  * install GEP from <a href="http://code.google.com/intl/sk-SK/appengine/docs/java/tools/eclipse.html">http://code.google.com/intl/sk-SK/appengine/docs/java/tools/eclipse.html</a>
  * cd acris-binding
  * mvn -f pom-showcase.xml gwt:eclipse
  * file sk.seges.acris.binding.Showcase.launch will be created
  * copy sk.seges.acris.binding.Showcase.launch into WORKSPACE/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.debug.core directory
  * restart (or start if it is not runnig) eclipse
  * enable Google Web Toolkit support on the acris-binding project
[http://acris.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/gep_project_support.PNG]
  * set sk.seges.acris.binding.Showcase as program argument in launch configuration
  * launch created Web application launcher to get development mode running
  * open following URL in your browser (change port, if you had specified different port):
http://localhost:8888/sk.seges.acris.binding.Showcase/Showcase.html?gwt.codesvr=192.168.145.82:9997
